title: Donjons et Dragons
description: A text-based RPG in Java where players interact through the terminal to explore dungeons, battle enemies, and save characters in a database.

title: Spiruline Website
description: E-commerce website for selling spirulina-based products. Features a suppliers list with filters and a map to locate them.

title: Shop Fruits and Veggies
description: An e-commerce site to order fruits and vegetables. Users can filter products, and the back-office allows administrators to manage inventory (add, update, delete products).

title: Make It Grow!
description: Make It Grow! is a smart vineyard management platform that provides real-time weather and soil data to help optimize agricultural decision-making. With an intuitive interface, users can access detailed forecasts, monitor environmental conditions, and enhance vineyard productivity using data-driven insights.

title: My Portfolio
description: My portfolio showcases my projects, skills, and experiences in a user-friendly and visually engaging way, offering an improved presentation of my work.
